::Aerotaur::
    "You're absolutely right.  I'm not in charge.  But that's not important 
because everyone here pulls their own weight.  Now unless you have something 
more productive to do.  I strongly suggest that you go help Windlord.  And 
don't mouth off saying you do everything.  All you've done since you woke up 
is have your head blown off.  NOW MOVE!"
